snippet: Obama administration officials have started working on contingency plans for a collapse of the Syrian government, focusing particularly on the chemical weapons the country is thought to possess.
abstract: Obama administration officials have started working on contingency plans for a collapse of the Syrian government, focusing particularly on the chemical weapons the country is thought to possess; American diplomatic and military officials say the bombing in Damascus that killed several of President Bashar al-Assad’s closest advisers is a turning point in the conflict.
lead_paragraph: Obama administration officials have started working on contingency plans for a collapse of the Syrian government, focusing particularly on the chemical weapons the country is thought to possess.

headline.seo: Expecting Assad’s Fall, Washington Plans for a New Syria
headline.main: Washington Begins to Plan for Collapse of Syrian Government
headline.print_headline: Anticipating Fall of Assad, Washington Starts Planning for a Changed Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
